issue.title: [Packaging] Support Ubuntu 18.10
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3600](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3600). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'd like to propose support Ubuntu 18.10, which has been released this October.
I'm going to open a pull request.

comments.body:
